channel.title: Escape The Fate
channel.description:
Hi guys what do you think of Escape The Fate?
I know they have had alot of up and downs (Ronnie Radke and Max Green story)...
I have now listened through ETF new album Ungrateful and it is loveing awesome, their new screamer is really good too, not just that they have improved their live performances aswell!
One thing I like the most of their new album is a song called Ungrateful which is about 'bullying', it has happened and will continue to happen awful things from bullying, but we can atleast do our best to try and stop it.
Escape The Fate (Live) - Live fast die beautiful (ft, caleb shomo from Attack Attack!).
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6h-DYGl-gNU[/youtube]

item.title: Escape The Fate
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

The sad thing is, Ronnie is a better rapper than most rappers today lol.

Uhm no. He needs to stay away from that B-S or he’ll be added to the rest of the people I don’t listen to when it comes to Rap.

As for ETF, I haven’t listened to them since both Ronnie left and I was bored with their music - I don’t mind them nor hate them but I simply am not interested with them.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I used to think they sucked ass but they’ve gotten better recently. I like Gorgeous Nightmare.

item.title: Escape The Fate
item.dc:creator: @Porygon Porygon
item.description:
@Porygon wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:4, topic:522824”][quote author=Porygon link=topic=641317.msg4320648#msg4320648 date=1372176964]
I was a major Escape the Fate fan. They’ve gone downhill for me. I might take a look at their new album. Ronnie Radke released his new album with Falling in Reverse this month and honestly, it’s flawless.
[/quote]
They need to lay off the electronic sounds.[/quote]
Why do you say that? Yes it’s new for them, but I think it sounds good. It’s not used to the point where it’s too much.

Read full topic
